programme.desc: Kailashnath (Amrish Puri) longs for his grandson Raj (Salman Khan) to get married and make him a great grandfather. Raj falls in love with Priya (Rani Mukherjee) and ties the knot. All is well and the couple lives in marital bliss. Priya discovers that she is pregnant. Unfortunately, she miscarries. Not only does she lose the baby, but she also becomes incapable of conceiving ever again. An article about surrogate mothers leads Priya to embark on this course. Raj, though hesitant, is referred to Madhubala (Preity Zinta) a prostitute who agrees to bear a child in return for money. The problem arises when Madhubala falls in love with Raj and insists on having him in return for the child. (Film - Romance)

programme.desc: A matchmaker sets out to teach Hoshiyar Chand, an arrogant rich man, a lesson. Hilarity ensues when he asks Raju, a coolie, to pretend to be a millionaire so he can marry Hoshiyar Chand's daughter. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Jawaan
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Picket 43
programme.desc: An Indian soldier guarding a picket in Kashmir meets a Pakistani soldier and they immediately become friends. However, their friendship is met with suspicion and several raised eyebrows. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Patel V/S Bhalla Perfect Mismatch
programme.desc: Aman and Neha, both coming from different communities, fall in love. Problems arise when their fathers do not agree to their marriage. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Taqdeer
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Aatma Ka Khel
programme.desc: A woman named Devi becomes her village's resident exorcist and takes on all its problems by using her skills to the fullest. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
programme.desc: Pawan, a devotee of Lord Hanuman, finds a girl, who is speech impaired, lost in Haryana. He soon learns that she belongs to Pakistan and sets out to reunite her with her family at great personal cost. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Housefull 3
programme.desc: Batook Patel doesn't want his three daughters to get married. But the girls already have boyfriends and hatch a plot to keep them, unaware that Batook and the boys have plans of their own. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Vardi Ka Dum
programme.desc: Subhash, a daredevil officer, raises his voice against injustice when he comes across a few politically influential people. However, when his family is brutally murdered, he sets out to exact revenge. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Hero No. 1
programme.desc: Meena and Rajesh meet in England and fall in love. When they return, Rajesh tells his father Dhanraj about Meena and asks him to approach Meena's family to talk about their marriage. When Rajesh's parents visit Meena's house, Dhanraj and Dinanath, Meena's father, get into an argument and Dinanath refuses to get the young couple married to each other. In his attempts to impress the family, Rajesh enters Meena's house as a servant. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.title: Khiladiyon Ka Khiladi
programme.desc: Ajay Malhotra has successfully established an orchestra in the US. His brother Akshay decides to visit him and on his way meets and falls in love with Priya. Once in the US, Akshay finds his brother missing and the police have a warrant for his own arrest and questioning. Trying to find his brother, Akshay encounters a female gangster, Maya, who also happens to be Priya's sister. He learns that Maya is holding Ajay since he is in possession of some incriminating evidence against her. Akshay decides to win her confidence and even lands himself in a deadly duel with her biggest enemy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Masaan
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: 7 1/2 Phere: More Than a Wedding
programme.desc: A stranger meets a Mumbai family who are busy planning a wedding and informs them that she wishes to produce their latest family wedding as a reality television serial. The family agrees but then backs out of the deal. A member of the family then strikes up a secret deal to have hidden cameras placed in the house to tape the reality show. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: 31st October
programme.desc: Post the assassination of Indira Gandhi by her Sikh security guards, Devender Singh, a Sardar, tries to protect his family during the anti-Sikh riots in Delhi. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Helicopter Eela
programme.desc: Eela Raiturkar, an aspiring singer, gives up on her career after her husband abandons her and their son, Vivaan. However, years later, he encourages his mother to pursue her dream. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Zubaan
programme.desc: An ambitious young boy, Dilsher, develops a speech impairment after his father's death. Initially, Dilsher is hesitant to pursue singing but Amira changes his mind and persuades him to try it. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Maqbool
programme.desc: Maqbool, an underworld don's henchman, falls in love with his boss's mistress, Nimmi, who instigates him to kill the don and become the next leader. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Aagey Se Right
programme.desc: An officer's gun is stolen by some youngsters and his attempts to retrieve it lead him to unexpected situations. Soon, he crosses paths with a terrorist who plans to plant a bomb during a gathering. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Running Shaadi
programme.desc: Two friends set up a website where couples can elope and get married against the wishes of their families. Their project is an instant hit but brings a different set of problems for the creators. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.title: Sonali Cable
programme.desc: Sonali is a young businesswoman who runs an internet providing agency with her team of boys, in suburban Mumbai. Her childhood sweetheart, Raghu, returns from the United States and helps her in expanding her business. But a huge corporation, Shining Broadband, wants to maintain their monopoly in the city. She is determined to win over the large conglomerates and so puts everything at stake. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Dhoondte Reh Jaoge
programme.desc: Anand Pawar and Raj Chopra try to make a low budget film that will be hooted out on the first day. They want to become instant millionaires in the shortest possible time. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Raqeeb
programme.desc: (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Raaz: The Mystery Continues
programme.desc: An artist is surprised to meet a girl who has an eerie resemblance to the one in his sketches. Soon after, she meets with accidents portrayed in his art. What is the secret behind the bizarre events. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Raat Gayi Baat Gayi
programme.desc: The movie is about three couples and urban age marriage. Rahul wakes up with a bad hangover after a party the night before. There, he had met a sexy young woman- Sophia. They got drunk and got intimate. But, Rahul dosen't remember what happened after that. His wife, Mitali, is in a bad mood this morning, and Rahul suspects that she might know about his little escapade last night. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Fukrey
programme.desc: Hunny, Choocha, Lali and Zafar want to make easy money and approach the notorious Bholi to invest in their plan. But when they lose her money, they must come up with a plan or face the consequences. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Jaanbaz Ki Jung
programme.desc: Rambabu is the carefree and pampered son of his parents. His life changes when he falls in love with Nandini who, unbeknownst to him, is on a mission to kill a dreaded gangster. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Uriyadi
programme.desc: When four final-year engineering students pick up a fight with a group of people, political leaders try to take advantage of the situation. Things get tense as the students get pulled into caste politics. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Om Jai Jagadish
programme.desc: Three brothers must come together to try and salvage what they can of their family business and estate. That is if they find time to do so from their very own personal problems and commitments. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Virasat Ki Jung
programme.desc: After facing the consequences of his brother's misdoings, Muthappa changes his identity and plans to start afresh. But the girl he loves refuses to marry him until he returns home and redeems himself. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Mohenjo Daro
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Ready
programme.desc: Tickling the funny bone of his audience, director Anees Bazmee creates yet another commercial hit that stars Bollywood's flamboyant superstar Salman Khan and the talented Asin, including special appearances by many renowned Indian actors. Set in Thailand and India, Asin plays the role of a runaway niece who pretends to be Salman's fiancee and wins the hearts of his family members as she tries to avoid an arranged marriage with her two greedy rival uncles' choice of grooms. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Makkhi
programme.desc: Sudeep is a shrewd business man and a womaniser. He sets his eyes on Bindhu who runs a non-profit organisation. However, Nani loves Bindhu and follows her everywhere. Bindhu is also in love with Nani but does not express her love to him and enjoys his attention. In the meantime, Sudeep gets to know about Nani's love for Bindhu and eventually kills him. Soon, Nani is reincarnated as a housefly to avenge his death and protect Bindhu. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Fashion designer Anita (Joely Richardson) and computer game writer Roger meet, fall in love and marry along with their dalmatians Perdita and Pongo. But the proud dogs puppies are kidnapped by Anitas boss Cruella De Vil (Glenn Close), who is stealing young Dalmatians to make the fur coat she has set her heart on. Enlisting the help of the other animals, Pongo and Perdita set out to find and rescue the pups from their fearsome captors. (Film - Family)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The New Mutants
programme.desc: A bunch of five young mutants who have suffered traumatic experiences are admitted into a secret facility. While they believe they are undergoing treatment to cure them of the dangers of their superpowers, they soon begin experiencing terrifying visions related to their past and question the safety of the institution. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: The actions of Thanos leave the universe in ruins with exactly half of all life disintegrated. The Avengers, however, refuse to give up and assemble again to try and bring back all the people that were lost, ready to do whatever it takes to undo the chaos caused by the Mad Titan. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Oh, a loveable misfit alien who is on the run from his own alien race, takes shelter on planet Earth and befriends Tip, an adventurous young girl who is on a quest to find her displaced mother Lucy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim is envious of his baby brother. But his animosity towards him doesn't last long when he learns that this baby, who calls himself The Boss, can talk and behave like an adult and is on a mission to stop Puppy Co from replacing the love for babies with puppies. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Home cooks from across Australia put their best plate forward to impress the judges and to secure a spot in the competition. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, a being from Halloween Town, finds Christmas Town and is instantly enchanted. The situation becomes riveting when his obsession with Christmas leads him to abduct Santa Claus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Six Days Seven Nights
programme.desc: Robin Monroe (Anne Heche), a fashion magazine editor, ends up getting stuck on a remote island, and to her woe, her only companion is Quinn Norris (Harrison Ford), a pilot whom she truly dislikes. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: When Elastigirl is called by Devtech to work on a project to change the public's perception towards superheroes, Mr Incredible is left in charge of the household. But looking after Dash, who is having trouble at school, Violet, who becomes withdrawn after her break-up, and baby Jack-Jack's ever-increasing array of abilities is a daunting task in itself. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin when he is wrongly framed in a CIA operation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Universal Soldier
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Legendary assassin Jason Bourne uncovers mysteries of his past, which puts him in the cross-hairs of a superkiller. (Film - Action)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: The chefs must translate one of the classic food sayings on display into a flavourful dish, worthy enough to impress the judges. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: Thomas loses his memory and finds himself trapped in a massive maze called the Glade. He and his friends try to escape from the maze and eventually learn that they are subjects of an experiment. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Following the events that took place in the previous instalment of the series, the infamous antihero, Riddick (Vin Diesel), holes up for five years dodging bounty hunters, which eventually leads him to planet Helion Prime. Soon after, the planet gets captured by an army as the Necromongers, led by Lord Marshal (Colm Feore), who are set to exterminate humanity. When Aereon (Judi Dench), leader of Helion's Elemental race, beseeches Riddick for help, he discovers the warrior within him. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Masaan
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: 7 1/2 Phere: More Than a Wedding
programme.desc: A stranger meets a Mumbai family who are busy planning a wedding and informs them that she wishes to produce their latest family wedding as a reality television serial. The family agrees but then backs out of the deal. A member of the family then strikes up a secret deal to have hidden cameras placed in the house to tape the reality show. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: 31st October
programme.desc: Post the assassination of Indira Gandhi by her Sikh security guards, Devender Singh, a Sardar, tries to protect his family during the anti-Sikh riots in Delhi. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Helicopter Eela
programme.desc: Eela Raiturkar, an aspiring singer, gives up on her career after her husband abandons her and their son, Vivaan. However, years later, he encourages his mother to pursue her dream. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Zubaan
programme.desc: An ambitious young boy, Dilsher, develops a speech impairment after his father's death. Initially, Dilsher is hesitant to pursue singing but Amira changes his mind and persuades him to try it. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Maqbool
programme.desc: Maqbool, an underworld don's henchman, falls in love with his boss's mistress, Nimmi, who instigates him to kill the don and become the next leader. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Aagey Se Right
programme.desc: An officer's gun is stolen by some youngsters and his attempts to retrieve it lead him to unexpected situations. Soon, he crosses paths with a terrorist who plans to plant a bomb during a gathering. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Running Shaadi
programme.desc: Two friends set up a website where couples can elope and get married against the wishes of their families. Their project is an instant hit but brings a different set of problems for the creators. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.title: Sonali Cable
programme.desc: Sonali is a young businesswoman who runs an internet providing agency with her team of boys, in suburban Mumbai. Her childhood sweetheart, Raghu, returns from the United States and helps her in expanding her business. But a huge corporation, Shining Broadband, wants to maintain their monopoly in the city. She is determined to win over the large conglomerates and so puts everything at stake. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Dhoondte Reh Jaoge

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Keeping with his famous trend of aestheticizing violence, Quentin Tarantino brings a war film starring Brad Pitt, Christoph Waltz and Melanie Laurent. Set in the backdrop of World War II, 'Inglourious Basterds' traverses the scheming and plotting of two groups that aim to assassinate prominent Nazi political leaders. But a single night changes the fate of everyone involved when the two groups cross each other's paths. (Film - War)

programme.title: A Brush With Love
programme.desc: Jamie Spellman, the owner of an art school and a struggling painter, makes a painting for a competition. Later, she tries to find someone in her life who resembles the man in her painting. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: Vlad the Impaler, a Transylvanian prince, is raised by the Turkish Empire to be an elite Janissary in the Sultan's special force. Having massacred thousands, Vlad's guilty conscience forces him to return to his kingdom. During one of his trips in the forest, Vlad and his soldiers enter an abandoned cave where they are attacked by a monster. Vlad escapes from the cave, into the sunlight, and the creature doesn't follow. On his return to the kingdom he is visited by Turkish emissaries who demand a tribute of 1000 boys who would be trained to become Janissaries like Vlad. Unwilling to fulfil the demand, Vlad meets the Turkish Sultan and offers himself against the boys but is rejected. With no other option left, Vlad turns to the devilish creature he had met before in the forest for help. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Zootopia
programme.desc: When Judy Hopps, a rookie officer in the Zootopia Police Department, sniffs out a sinister plot, she enlists the help of a con artist to solve the case in order to prove her abilities to Chief Bogo, who doesn't trust her very much. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi director Roland Emmerich's 'Independence Day' is one of the highest-grossing films of all time and has also won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects. It follows the efforts of a computer whiz (Jeff Goldblum) who foresaw the aliens' intent, a hot-shot pilot (Will Smith), the U.S. President (Bill Pullman) and a ragtag group of survivors who unite to save mankind after an alien race invades Earth and destroys most of its major cities. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Ariel, a mermaid, flouts rules of the mermaid kingdom and gets fascinated with the human world. When she meets Prince Eric, she falls in love with him and resolves to find a way to be with him. In the process, she ends up striking a dangerous deal with Ursula, a sea witch. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: John Carter
programme.desc: Based on the fantastical 'Barsoom' series by Edgar Rice Burroughs, this action adventure film follows the exploits of a courageous Civil War veteran, John Carter, who finds himself transported to a barren planet, Barsoom (Mars), when he touches a mysterious medallion. Once there, he finds himself in the middle of a conflict and is soon captured. With the superhuman strength he seems to have gained on the planet, is he meant to be the deliverer of peace in Barsoom. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Bobby Hayes and his aide Nick Walker, who work as detectives for the Boston Police Department, steal gold while they are on duty. Bobby kills Nick so that he doesn't return the booty to the officials during a raid. In the afterlife, Nick is hired by Mildred Proctor, the director of Rest In Peace Department (R.I.P.D.), a group of deceased police officers. Nick is assigned the responsibility to fight against the renegade ghosts. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Tremors 2: Aftershocks
programme.desc: In a bid to earn a large sum of money, Earl Bassett and Burt Gummer accept a job by a large Mexican oil company to protect one of their fields from giant underground worms known as 'graboids'. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Undisputed
programme.desc: An action movie that narrates the story of a heavyweight champion called George Iceman Chambers who lands in prison where the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champion. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A possible assassination of the Chinese premier and a conspiracy involving the MI-7, KGB and the CIA force the bosses at MI-7 to recall their brave but unconventional agent, Johnny English, who after a failed mission is seeking a shot at redemption. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: A disgraced martial artist's simple life is disturbed when he inadvertently fights a group of drug dealers. As the conflict deepens, several people around him are threatened. As a result, he is forced to rise against a very powerful and dangerous drug lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Director Patrick Read Johnson's adventurous family comedy 'Baby's Day Out' narrates the story of three wannabe kidnappers, Eddie (Joe Mantegna), Norby (Joe Pantoliano) and Veeko (Brian Haley) disguise themselves as photographers, enter a huge mansion and make away with Baby Bink (Adam and Jacob Worton), millionaires Bennington (Matthew Glave) and Laraine (Lara Flynn Boyle) Cotwell's son. But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Three years after Jurassic World is destroyed, Claire Dennis, its former manager, is recruited to save its dinosaurs from an impending volcano. She enlists the help of Owen Grady, a velociraptor trainer. But the duo soon discovers that the dinosaurs may be in a bigger peril than they anticipated. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: After Scrat's pursuit of an acorn sets off a series of asteroids to strike Earth, Manny, Sid, Diego and their herd must find a way to survive the impending doom. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Mercenaries William and Tovar are imprisoned in the Great Wall by a faction called the Nameless Order, which battles alien monsters that attack every sixty years. Once there, William ends up befriending Lin, a young commander, and decides to assist the Nameless Order in accomplishing their selfless mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Guardians Of The Galaxy
programme.desc: Peter Quill, kidnapped from the earth by space pirates while he was still a child, escapes from the planet Morag, carrying with him a mysterious yet valuable orb and, as a result, is followed closely by the assassin of Ronan the Accuser who wants it for himself. Quill knows that he cannot take on Ronan alone in a battle in space, so he decides to put together a team of brave and heroic individuals with superpowers, calling them the Guardians of the Galaxy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, a being from Halloween Town, finds Christmas Town and is instantly enchanted. The situation becomes riveting when his obsession with Christmas leads him to abduct Santa Claus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend Of The Seven Seas
programme.desc: Superstar Brad Pitt lends his voice to the daredevil adventure-seeker from Middle East, Sinbad the Sailor, who is falsely accused of stealing a legendary magical Book of Peace. To make matters worse, malevolent goddess Eris puts forth a challenge giving Sinbad ten days to find the book or his childhood friend Prince Proteus will take the death penalty on his behalf. Sinbad and Proteus' fiancee Marina set out to face every obstacle that comes their way in order to save their dear Proteus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a street urchin, discovers a magical lamp and learns about a Genie trapped inside it. When the Genie bestows upon him three wishes, he uses them to win the heart of Jasmine, his lady-love, and protect her from Jafar, a cunning vizier. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Planes: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: Dusty Crophopper is a celebrity racer with a fantastic career. In a turn of events, he trains to become a certified firefighter. He visits Piston Peak National Park and is supervised by Blade Ranger, who is not impressed by him. Dusty's structure is changed in order to meet the needs of a firefighting plane. It also seems that his career is coming to an end with a fire in his gearbox. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Forced to adopt a civilian identity and stuck in a white-collar job, Mr Incredible itches to get back into action. When he is lured into a trap by the evil Syndrome, his family contrives to save him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: The movie, part animation part live action, starring Amy Adams as a fairytale princess stuck in modern-day New York, embodies the best traditions of Disney. It depicts the life of a princess from the land of Andalasia, who is thrust into the heart of New York City by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: Grey, a technophobe, suffers paralysis and loses his wife during an attack. But when a billionaire hands him a chip in his body that restores his mobility, he sets out to get vengeance. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Sam misses his father, a virtual world designer, and enters a virtual space that has become much more dangerous than his father intended. Now, both father and son embark upon a life-and-death journey. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Jason Bourne's location is revealed to the FBI when he decrypts their files to know more about his past and his father. CIA director Robert Dewey unwillingly authorises Heather Lee, head of the Cyber Ops division, to contact Bourne and bring him back. However, he also secretly sends an assassin in order to execute Bourne. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier

programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Within These Walls
programme.desc: A single mother breaks up with her boyfriend and asks him to move out of their house when things do not work for her. However, she soon starts experiencing strange happenings in the house. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: Buck, a giant yet generous dog, feels helpless when he is abducted from his home and transported to the remote Yukon, where Perrault decides to use him for his dog sled mail operations. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: After being fired from the Anti-Villain League, Gru sets out to meet his long-lost twin, Dru, for the first time. But he is soon forced to team up with his brother to take down Balthazar Bratt, a former child star, whose obsession with his 80s character turns him into a supervillain. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Iron Man
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Alice, now 19 years old, follows a rabbit in a blue coat to a magical wonderland from her dreams where she is reunited with her friends who make her realise her true destiny. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: John Rambo is offered the chance to cut short his prison tenure by going on a secret mission for the US government deep into the jungles of Vietnam and locating American POWs. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.desc: In this action thriller, the dashing Keanu Reeves dons the role of 'John Wick', a hitman who follows the path of harmony upon falling in love with Helen. When she dies of an illness, she leaves behind a dog to help him come to grips with the situation. But when a bunch of men attack John and kill the puppy, he springs back into action and hunts down every man responsible for the act, including his former employer's son. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A man with a bullet-ridden body is found and looked after by strangers. He wakes up to a blank memory and begins a journey to find out his identity. The road ahead is full of danger and conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Undisputed
programme.desc: An action movie that narrates the story of a heavyweight champion called George Iceman Chambers who lands in prison where the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champion. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Jab We Met
programme.desc: Depressed after the passing of his father, Dharamraj; as well as his gorgeous girlfriend ditching him, Mumbai-based businessman Aditya Kashyap takes a BEST bus, goes to Chatrapati Shivaji Train Terminus, and boards a train. This is where he meets Geet Kaur Dhillon, who is returning home to Bhatinda, and who pays for his ticket. At Bar Nagar, he decides to leave, but she follows him, missing her train. They manage to get a ride to Ratlam, miss the train again, but eventually make it to Bhatinda. Once there, he gets to meet her family; her pretty sister, Roop; as well as her to-be betrothed, Manjeet Singh Mann. Before the engagement could be finalized, she manages to convince her family that she wants to marry Aditya, and they welcome him with open arms. Before he could take stock of these new developments, she elopes with him - not to get married - but to re-locate to Manali - where her true love, Anshuman, is waiting, and who she hopes to get married to. (Drama,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: No Problem
programme.desc: Sanjay and Akshaye, childhood friends and small time crooks rob a bank managed by Paresh. The two of them specially, Akshaye, on and off contemplates changing tracks and leaving the world of crime. Sanjay on the other hand almost every time manages to do something which closes all doors for Akshaye to change his life. This bank robbery also does the same. Akshaye is back where he belongs. Paresh is accused as an accomplice of Sanjay and Akshaye since the two had stayed in his house the night before the robbery.Paresh swears he will not return without the proof of his innocence. (Comedy)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Nazar
programme.desc: Bombay Police are baffled when several bar girls and prostitutes are found brutally murdered by a scalpel.

programme.title: Mehboob Mere Mehboob
programme.desc: The region of Jungela and Takt Hazar have been embroiled in hatred for centuries. Now a young man named Ranjha from Takt Hazar, who lives with several brothers and their respective wives, has fallen in love with a young woman named Heer from Jungela. His brothers will not permit him to marry outside the region, while the parents of Heer are agreeable. But when Ranjha does not show up on the wedding night, they arrange her marriage with another suitor by the name of Saheda Khan, even though Heer does not give her consent to the marriage, she is married. After the marriage, Ranjha comes to meet with Heer and their romance is rekindled, much to the chagrin of Saheda, who wants Heer to follow the Shariyat Law, obey him, sleep with him, and shun Ranjha. Heer refuses to do so and Saheda calls upon the Islamic Clergy, who are unable to convince Heer. Then the Maharaja gets involved when he finds out that Heer has been forcibly married. But evidence that comes before him leads him to conclude that Heer was indeed having an extra-marital affair, so he orders punishment for both of the young lovers. Will the ill-fated lovers ever come together or will local rulers, laws, and regional boundaries continue to separate them? (Romance)

programme.title: Sikka
programme.desc: Two close and very wealthy friends, Vijay and Pranlal, decide to cement their friendship to a relationship when Vijay proposes marriage on behalf of his sister, Shobha, with Pranlal's son, Amar. Pranlal agrees, and preparations are on for the marriage to take place. Vijay finds out that Pranlal and his men are using their business as a front for drugs and smuggling, and he decides to cancel the wedding. Pranlal is angry with Vijay, but refuses to give up his criminal career. When Amar finds out about his dad's spurious activities, he kills himself. Pranlal, humiliated and angered, vows to avenge Amar's death, and wants Shobha to be Amar's widow for the rest of her life, which is not acceptable to Vijay. Then Shobha meets with a handsome stranger named Jackie, who rescues her. She offers him employment with her brother's firm, and they fall in love with each other. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Aaj Ka Ravan
programme.desc: A series of unfortunate events plague journalist Shanti after a fellow journalist is shot to death on her doorstep

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Besharam
programme.desc: Babli (Ranbir Kapoor) is a street smart car mechanic living in a Delhi orphanage. He is charming and lives life to the fullest. He also steals cars to support his orphanage. He has no sense of right or wrong till he unwittingly hurts the love of his life, Tara (Pallavi Sharda). Babli realizes that there is no right way of doing the wrong thing. Babli sets out to fix all the wrongs in his life and he continues to be shameless about it. (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Tadipaar
programme.desc: Shankar (Mithun Chakraborty) is sentenced to live outside the limits of the city due to a Police case. One day he happens to rescue a woman in distress from some hoodlums and finds out that her name is Namkeen, who resembles a missing multi-millionaire Mohinidevi (Pooja Bhatt). Shankar asks Namkeen to impersonate Mohinidevi to embezzle her wealth. Namkeen agrees to do so, but the question remains: where is Mohinidevi, and what will happen to Namkeen when she is found? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Kismat
programme.desc:
A policeman’s son begins to work with criminals. Can his life be turned around?
Ajay (Govinda) is adopted and brought up by ACP Anand (Suresh Oberoi) and his biological mother Geeta (Rakhee), though the parents believe he is actually Anand’s child. Fate intervenes when Ajay begins to work with his real father, Rajan (Kabir Bedi).

programme.title: Kshatriya
programme.desc: In the arid region of Rajasthan, India; there are two royal families, Mirtagarth and Surjangarh who believes in a religious ritual which states that a warrior from each of these two families will come together annually to have a fierce battle with the winner having to sacrifice a baby buffalo and it will rain in that person's territory. This tradition must be fated to carry on by the future generation as it is a rule of nature set down by their kin. (Action,Drama,War)

programme.title: Apna Sapna Money Money
programme.desc: Kishan is a young man from Goa whose brain is full of every conceivable trick to make a quick buck. He cons people by slipping into different outfits and by assuming many guises. Julie, is a sexy club dancer with quite a local reputation, but behind her raunchy exterior is a compassionate, kind-hearted woman who goes out of her way to help the needy... (Comedy)

programme.title: Daanveer
programme.desc: After the passing away of his widower and advocate dad, Vijay Srivastav takes it upon himself to raise his younger siblings, Vishal and Sudha. Years later, while Vishal is studying I.A.S., Sudha is of marriageable age, while Vijay makes a living driving an auto-rickshaw. He arranges Sudha's marriage with Anil, the only son of Ramprasad and Shanti, with a dowry of over 3 Lakh Rupees. The marriage takes place and Sudha re-locates to live with her in-laws. A few months later Vijay is informed that Sudha is expecting and brings her home. Shortly thereafter his world will be turned upside down when he finds out that Anil is getting married and had actually driven Sudha out as he suspected her of having an affair with another man. While Vijay attempts to deal with this situation, he does not know that Vishal has fallen in love with Jyoti, who is the daughter of Kalyan Singh - a man who is obsessed with avenging the death of his father at the hands of Vijay's dad, while Kalyan's son, Bheema, is all set to get married to Vijay's girlfriend, Chitra. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Zeher A Love Story
programme.desc: Siddharth, a police officer who is soon to be divorced, has an affair with Anna. However, when she is found dead, he realises he got more than he bargained for. (Thriller)

programme.title: Lashkar
programme.desc: Professor Anand lives a wealthy lifestyle in Bombay along with his wife, son, Raju, and a sister, Barkha, who will soon get married to Police Inspector Sumeet. Anand gets information that about a drug deal through Raghu, and together he and Sumeet apprehend Sangram Singh, who is arrested, tried in Court, but not found guilty. As a result, Sumeet resigns, and subsequently, Sangram's men break into Anand's house, kill his wife and son, assault Barkha, who is hospitalized, and loses her memory. Anand and Sumeet recruit Bhima, Amar, and Johnny, and they wage war on Sangram and his illegal operations. They do make a huge impact, and even influence Sangram's daughter to go against her dad. Their future plans change drastically when Sangram decides to strike back - this time by targeting each one of his opponents individually, and abducting Barkha. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Jaan Se Pyara
programme.desc: A man tries to lead a double life as a Cop and at the same time look after his retarded twin brother and devoted mother. But then his dangerous police work comes in the way of his family life causing tragedy. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Run
programme.desc: This action movie is filled with romance and adventure. As Abhisek fights for his life against the forces of crime and injustice, he meets Bhoomika, who captures his heart. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Zakhmi Sipahi
programme.desc: Shakti is an honest police officer out to avenge the death of his father, Gautam Gorakhnath, and the trials and obstacles he faces while he goes through corruption, love, and usual Hindi film masala. (Action)

programme.title: One Two Three
programme.desc: Laxminarayan lives a poor lifestyle in Mumbai along with his widowed mother, Kanta, who wants him to be a successful gangster like Batlabhai, and would like him to kill a few people, make enough money, then get married to Khujli's daughter, Meena. In order to fulfill his mother's wish, Laxminarayan accepts a contract to kill D'Mello Yadav, a Pondi-based gangster, who has stolen a diamond from Batl (Comedy)

programme.title: Showbiz
programme.desc: Rohan Arya lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and is a professional singer with Showbiz, which is managed by Inder Raj Bahl, while Rohan's personal Manager is Shikha Verma. Rohan and Shikha are attracted to each other, and after Journalist Sharad Rajpoot publishes their photographs, both publicly announce their forthcoming engagement. Then chaos enters their lives when Rohan's car is involved in an accident while he is in the company of a prostitute named Tara. Shikha refuses to have to do anything with him, while a frenzied media focuses in on Rohan's personal life - especially after word gets out that he may have known Tara before he met Shikha. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Kaun Kare Kurbanie
programme.desc: After his transfer from Delhi, Inspector Arjun Singh lives in Bombay along with his wife, Anita, school-going son, Munna; and a younger collegian brother, Ajit. Arjun is disappointed with Ajit as he spends most of his time singing, dancing and flirting with girls. Then a series of sexual molestations and killings of attractive bikini-clad young women take place, and Arjun is assigned to this case. After a short period of time, his investigations lead him to a wealthy suspect, but when the suspect's daughter is molested and killed, his department gets evidence that may implicate another suspect - none other than Ajit. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: A well-meaning but disgraced cop, is determined to fight a corrupt system, taking to task miscreants and criminals in his city. (Action)

programme.title: Alibaba Marjinaa
programme.desc: Circa the Mughal rule in Persia, Alibaba lives a poor life-style with his mother; married brother Qasim and his wife. When a princess named Marjinaa is being sold in the slave market, Alibaba wants to buy her and set her free, but he does not have the money. So he borrows some money from Qasim, buys Marjinaa, who offers to live with him as his slave for the rest of her life. Alibaba would like to end slavery, but is unable to do anything as he does not have money. Then one day his mother goes to Qasim to borrow some scales, and it is later that Qasim finds out that Alibaba has come across considerable wealth - enough to buy all the slaves and set them free. Qasim gets more information from Alibaba, so that he can also get wealthy. Qasim does not know that he has just signed away the rest of his life, and put the lives of his wife, mother and brother also in grave danger. (Action,Adventure)

programme.title: Saathi
programme.desc: A doctor doing research on cancer treatment faces challenges when he first loses his wife, and then his vision. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Bhishma
programme.desc: Paro, her mother, and her brother, Natwar, find an unconscious man near their town. They bring him over to their house, nurse and nurture him back to good health, only to find out that he has the mind of a 12 year of old child, and name him Bhola. Years pass by, Paro has fallen in love with Bhola, for he rescued her from a molester, and both would like to get married. Before that could happen, Bhola is viciously attacked and left for dead by Paro's molester, and is hospitalized. While in hospital, Police Sub-Inspector Abhimanyu Verma finds out that Bhola is not who he claims to be but a homicidal maniac, wanted for killing three policemen - named Bhisma - and is possibly masquerading as a 12 year old child to hide from the police.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: A cold-blooded contract killer hires the services of a cab driver for a full night. He forces the driver to go around Dubai as he keeps finishing off witnesses scheduled to testify against a gangster.

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: 15th August
programme.desc: Nagpal kills Chaudhry and his son, Ram, a military officer. Chaudhry's second son, Vikram, vows to destroy Nagpal who is all set to become the Chief Minister on the upcoming Indian Independence Day.

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Badhaai Ho Badhaai
programme.desc: The D'Souza and the Chaddha families are neighbors and have been good friends for as long as they can remember, and despite their diverse religion and cultural beliefs, celebrate Diwali and... (Comedy,Drama,Musical)

programme.title: Aaj Ka Ravan
programme.desc: A series of unfortunate events plague journalist Shanti after a fellow journalist is shot to death on her doorstep

programme.title: Kalyug
programme.desc: The husband of a woman who commits suicide after a run-in with the adult entertainment industry seeks revenge on those who drove her to her death. In doing so, he delves into the world of international human trafficking, eventually traveling across the world to seek out the ringleaders of this horrifying enterprise. (Thriller)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: China Gate
programme.desc: After witnessing the brutal slaying of her Forest Officer father, Sunder Rajan, at the hands of dreaded dacoit Jageera, Sandhya goes to Colonel Krishnakant Puri and asks for his assistance in bringing an end to Jageera's rule in the Devdurg region. Krishnakant agrees to assist her, and summons about a dozen of his fellow officers and subordinates to assist him. They all assemble at Devdurg with all the necessary ammunitions and arms to combat Jageera, not realizing that Jageera has influence over the local police detachment, who will prevent Puri and his men to possess any guns and weapons. This does not deter Puri and his men, and they continue to stay on in Devdurg and gain the confidence of the villagers. What the villagers do not know that Krishnakant and his men had all been dishonorably discharged from the army for cowardice and retreating when attacked by the enemy. Will Puri and his men abandon Devdurg and let history repeat itself? (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller,Western)

programme.title: Gurudev
programme.desc: Inspector Dev Kumar and Gaurav alias Guru are childhood friends. The problem is that while Dev Kumar is with the police, his dad, Parshu Ram, works with the underworld, and is the right-hand man of Kakhan, a criminal don, who is also Guru's dad. When Inspector Khan is assigned the case of apprehending Kakhan, his first suspect is none other than Dev himself, and Dev must prove to Khan that he is earnest, and will not hesitate to arrest Kakhan. It remains to be seen if Dev will really apprehend his friend's dad, or just play around without really getting anywhere. (Romance)

programme.title: Jeena Marna Tere Sang
programme.desc: Amar is the son of a millionaire. He decides to avenge on Asha for slapping him in public, but later falls for her. He also discovers the truth about his father. (Romance,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Woh Lamhe
programme.desc: Based upon the life of actress Parveen Babi, this film describes the life of a schizophrenic actress Sana Azim, and the love of her life - Aditya Garewal. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Calling Bell
programme.desc: Karthik and Vyshali, the newly-wed couple, moves into a villa and starts to live together. Soon, Karthik realises that he's been living with a ghost instead of his wife. (Horror)

programme.title: Ustadon Ke Ustad
programme.desc: Vishwanath and Jaikishan are two thieves and good friends. When they try to lead an honest life for the sake of their women, Pukhraj turns them against each other and the two become sworn enemies.

programme.title: Khatron Ke Khiladi
programme.desc: Honest truck driver Balwant watch helplessly as the owners of the trucking company he works for mauled his brother, Jaswant to death. When he lodges a complaint with the police the inspector instead arrest him for this crime; the trucking company owners then burn his house killing his pregnant wife Sumati. Years later Balwant who now calls himself Karamvir operates a court called 'Teesri Adalat' by sentencing wrong-doers to death in a judge and executer style. However he is unaware that Sumati is still alive and has given birth to twins Rajesh and Mahesh; while Mahesh was separated at birth and grows up with Inspector Ram Avtar and his wife - Rajesh is taking care of his mother as she loses her mental balance in the trauma. Rajesh and Mahesh do get to unite as the girls they are in love with are link to each other. After a few misjudgments of situations at hand Rajesh and Mahesh decides that they will bring Teesri Adalat to the court of law - at any cost. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Kaliya No. 1
programme.desc: A tough police officer goes out of his way to bring down the underworld dons and is even ready to murder them in planned encounters to rid the society of evil.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Ads)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Ads)

programme.title: Diljalaa
programme.desc: Mamta lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Bombay along with widower dad, Ratanmuni Gupta, who works as a Manager with Sharda Chemicals, while she studies in Lovedale College in Manori. Her dad wants her to marry a naive, semi-senile, Munna, the only son of widowed, Sharda, his employer. On the day of the engagement she humiliates her dad, Munna and Sharda and refuses to marry Munna. Shortly thereafter a number of young children die after being injected with medication from Sharda Chemicals, the Police investigate, arrest Sharda, while Munna kills himself. Ratanmuni and his partners, D.S. Mittal, Mehra, Radhey and Shyam, take over Sharda Chemicals and re-name it Friend's Chemicals. Sometime later when Mamta returns from Manori, her dad introduces her to wealthy Mrs. Modi, who wants her to wed her only son, Azad. Both Azad and Mamta approve of each other, meet with each other and get intimate. On the day of their engagement, many surprises await Mamta as she finds out that the man she got intimate with is not the real Azad, while the real Azad and his mom will have nothing to do with a now characterless Mamta. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Badi Bahen
programme.desc: Jyoti, a girl found by the riverbank, is adopted by a gardener who works for a wealthy family. Years later, she finally finds her true identity amidst love, deceit and twists of fate. (Drama)

programme.title: Insaaf Ki Takkar
programme.desc: Laxman Krishna, a criminal lawyer, manages to win all his cases. All the wrong-doers consider him as their God. But things change when he is assigned to defend the convicts who have murdered a girl. (Crime)

programme.title: Krishan Avtaar
programme.desc: Police Inspector Krishan Kumar lives a middle class life with his lovely wife, Suman. Suman gets pregnant and gives birth to a baby girl but tragically passes away, leaving Krishan widowed, heart-broken and devastated. Krishan also encounters a tumor, which is presently inoperable, and may eventually lead to his death. Then a large number of the city's children go missing, and Krishan, together with Inspector Avtaar are assigned to investigate this matter. They are also asked to investigate the murder of fellow police inspector Vishnu Sawant. Krishan's investigation leads him to corruption in his very own department; the involvement of a prominent minister in the government; and the daughter of Inspector Sawant himself. Faced with failing health and vision, Krishan must make his move quickly before he becomes totally disabled from doing any more police work. (Action)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Ads)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Ads)

programme.title: Main Intequam Loonga
programme.desc: Kumar Agnihotri belongs to a wealthy family, consisting of his dad, Madan, and mom, Janki. He is in love with beautiful Mala Bajpai, and they hope to marry soon with the blessings of their respective parents. Kumar's other passion is boxing, which Janki loathes, and hopes that he will give this up soon. When the Agnihotris bring home a woman named Ganga, and introduce her to Kumar as Janki's childhood friend, Kumar finds out that Ganga is his biological mother, and his father, Ajay Kumar, was the National Champion in boxing, who was killed by three men for refusing to lose a fight. While Janki is afraid that she is going her son to Ganga, Kumar has decided to avenge his biological's father's death by any means, little realizing that he may face the same fate his father did years ago. (Action,Drama)

programme.desc: Judge D.K. Sinha is an honest and hard-working man. He lives with his wife, and two sons, Rajkishan and Suresh. While he is confident that Rajkishan is honest and diligent, he is clearly disappointed with Suresh, who is not only dishonest, but has a violent temper, which gets him into trouble with the police. Imagine the shock the Sinha family gets when they come to know that Suresh has been arrested for murder, and the case has been assigned to Suresh's dad for disposal. (Drama,Action)

programme.title: Ansh
programme.desc: This story is about Deputy Superintendent of Police Bhagat Pandey (Om Puri), who is thorough, honest, and has an excellent track record of apprehending criminals. This background creates problems for him with other criminals who are closely connected to powerful politicians. As a result he is transferred to Bombay (now know as Mumbai). He takes charge of his post, and transforms everything to a diligent and honest policing machine. Unfortunately, politicians and criminals alike do not like his diligence, and talk about transferring him to Kashmir, where he will be killed in an encounter by a terrorist. Bhagat also comes in touch with suspended Police Inspector Sukhdev Singh, and gangleader, Rajnath Guru, the son of a freedom-fighter, Dinanathji (Aloknath). (Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway
programme.desc: Bea, Thomas, and the rabbits have created a makeshift family, but despite his best efforts, Peter can’t seem to shake his mischievous reputation. Adventuring out of the garden, Peter finds himself in a world where his mischief is appreciated, but when his family risks everything to come looking for him, Peter must figure out what kind of bunny he wants to be. (Family,Comedy,Adventure,Animation,Fantasy)

programme.title: Suriya S3
programme.desc: Durai Singham, an honest and uncompromising DCP, takes on a businessman and his goons who are involved in illegal dumping of toxic waste and causing serious health concerns. (Action)

programme.title: Mohra
programme.desc: Journalist Roma Singh is the daughter of a jailer. While taking a tour of the jail, she is molested by some of the inmates, and an inmate, Vishal Agnihotri comes to her assistance. She finds out that Vishal is in for four homicides, and decides to investigate further. She finds out, with the help of the owner of her publications, Jindal that Vishal was compelled to take the law in his own hands when the courts failed to punish the assailants of his sister and sweetheart. Soon, Vishal is released from prison, and begins to work for Jindal. It is then that he realizes that he has just walked from a walled prison, to an open prison, as the truth behind his release slowly but surely starts to dawn on him. (Drama,Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Coolie No. 1
programme.desc: Insulted by Rosario, a rich businessman, Jai Kishen a Matchmaker teaches him a lesson by getting his daughter married to Raju, a Coolie, who poses to be a millionaire. They sense something fishy and Raju's deceptions are discovered. In an attempt to cover it up, he cooks up a story of having a filthy rich twin. One lie leads to another and things start to go awry culminating in a comedy of errors. (Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: In the final days of World War II, the Nazis attempt to use black magic to aid their dying cause. The Allies raid the camp where the ceremony is taking place, but not before a demon - Hellboy - has already been conjured. Joining the Allied forces, Hellboy eventually grows to adulthood, serving the cause of good rather than evil. (Fantasy,Action,Science Fiction)

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Twins, separated at birth, end up as a Hong Kong gangster and a New York concert pianist. When the pianist travels to Hong Kong for a concert, the two inevitably get mistaken for each other. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Entertainment-based programme. (Entertainment)

programme.title: Half Girlfriend
programme.desc: Madhav Jha, a rustic boy from Bihar who is drawn to his college-mate, Riya Somani, an affluent English-speaking girl from Delhi. There’s just one hitch here. Riya is willing to go thus far and no further; Madhav continues being obsessed with her. Will the Bihar boy and the Delhi girl make it past the half-way mark? (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: 36 China Town
programme.desc: Sonia [Isha Koppikar] is the owner of a casino in Goa. A successful entrepreneur, the only love in her life is her son. When the toddler suddenly goes missing, the lady is distraught and distressed. She offers a huge reward [Rs. 25 lacs] to anyone who can trace her son.Raj [Shahid Kapoor] and Priya [Kareena Kapoor], two strangers from different backgrounds, accidentally spot the child and decide to split the reward money given by Sonia. But when they finally reach Sonia's mansion late at night, they find her murdered!Raj and Priya panic and escape from the mansion. In the confusion that follows, Priya forgets her suitcase in the mansion. Soon, they are the chief suspects in the murder. The cop [Akshaye Khanna] realizes that this isn't an open-and-shut case, since a number of new suspects show up while the investigations are on. (Comedy,Thriller)

programme.title: Loveyatri
programme.desc: Romance blossoms between young Sushrut and Michelle when they meet during the festival of Navratri. When Michelle returns home to the United Kingdom, Sushrut embarks on an adventurous journey through a strange land to win back the woman he loves. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Entertainment
programme.desc: Akhil (Akshay Kumar) finds out that he is the heir of 3000 crore rupees as he and his mother were abandoned by his diamond baron father (Panna Laal Johari) who is now dead. However, his life goes Topsy-turvy when he learns that the empire goes to entertainment (a dog). (Comedy)

programme.title: The Real Tevar
programme.desc: Harsha, a multi-millionaire guy who has everything but there is something else he's looking for and in the process he adopts a complete village trying to bring change in the people. (Romance,Action,Family,Drama)

programme.title: Masss
programme.desc: A conman gains the power to see and communicate with ghosts and decides to use it to make money. His happy-go-lucky lifestyle goes for a toss when a ghost who is his look-alike approaches him with an offer. (Comedy,Thriller,Horror)

programme.title: Shivam
programme.desc: The movie is directed by Srinivas Reddy and produced by Ravi Kishore. The film is produced under Sri Sravanthi movies banner. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Fukrey Returns
programme.desc: A year after the first movie, the four friends are enjoying their lives to the fullest, get in trouble once again with Bholi, who is released from prison earlier than expected and is broke. (Comedy,Drama)
